original_title: Wimal Weerawansa To Appear Before The Tangalle Police
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Minister Wimal Weerawansa has been instructed to appear before the Tangalle Police the day after tomorrow.This summons relates to an inquiry concerning a statement he made to the media about an individual named 'Beliatte Sana'He is required to appear at the Tangalle Police Station at 10 a.m. on that day.
